<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7f14155f422ffcc997fc5a0b635a20a4bafd2093|patch 8.2.0722: Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif>
patch 8.2.0722: Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif

Problem:    Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif.
Solution:   Use postponed constants.  Delete the code for evaluating a
            constant expression.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0722: Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif · vim/vim@7f14155
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0722: Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif · vim/vim@7f14155
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: not handling constant expression for elseif. Solution: Use postponed constants. Delete the code for evaluating a constant expression.

patch 8.2.0723: Vim9: nested constant expression not evaluated compile time

Problem:    Vim9: nested constant expression not evaluated compile time.
Solution:   Use compile_expr1() for parenthesis.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0723: Vim9: nested constant expression not evaluated compil… · vim/vim@1c74721
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0723: Vim9: nested constant expression not evaluated compil… · vim/vim@1c74721
attachments.text: …e time Problem: Vim9: nested constant expression not evaluated compile time. Solution: Use compile_expr1() for parenthesis.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/09689a02840be40fa7bb10b1921fb5bc5b2908f1|patch 8.2.0725: Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 s…>
patch 8.2.0725: Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 script

Problem:    Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 script.
Solution:   Make two passes through the script file.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0725: Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 s… · vim/vim@09689a0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0725: Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 s… · vim/vim@09689a0
attachments.text: …cript Problem: Vim9: cannot call a function declared later in Vim9 script. Solution: Make two passes through the script file.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3b6a6eb7b4e0ac5b75dd2518bd27bce2b13298a3|patch 8.2.0726: Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def f…>
patch 8.2.0726: Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def function

Problem:    Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def function.
Solution:   Check if function is compiled earlier.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0726: Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def f… · vim/vim@3b6a6eb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0726: Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def f… · vim/vim@3b6a6eb
attachments.text: …unction Problem: Vim9: leaking memory when calling not compiled :def function. Solution: Check if function is compiled earlier.

patch 8.2.0727: MS-Windows: new gcc compiler does not support scanf format

Problem:    MS-Windows: new gcc compiler does not support scanf format.
Solution:   Use "%ll" instead of "%I". (Ken Takata)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0727: MS-Windows: new gcc compiler does not support scanf f… · vim/vim@d695ba7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0727: MS-Windows: new gcc compiler does not support scanf f… · vim/vim@d695ba7
attachments.text: …ormat Problem: MS-Windows: new gcc compiler does not support scanf format. Solution: Use "%ll" instead of "%I". (Ken Takata)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/69212b11d18d9d8951968f6ca88e6ce046c90675|patch 8.2.0728: messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned>
patch 8.2.0728: messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned

Problem:    Messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned.
Solution:   Output a CR before the NL. (Dominique Pelle, #6055)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0728: messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned · vim/vim@69212b1
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0728: messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned · vim/vim@69212b1
attachments.text: Problem: Messages about a deadly signal are not left aligned. Solution: Output a CR before the NL. (Dominique Pelle, #6055)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/89483d40438830fb9e74a5ec6c92d2470b05e4c2|patch 8.2.0729: Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared>
patch 8.2.0729: Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared

Problem:    Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared.
Solution:   When sourcing a script again clear all script-local variables.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0729: Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared · vim/vim@89483d4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0729: Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared · vim/vim@89483d4
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: When reloading a script variables are not cleared. Solution: When sourcing a script again clear all script-local variables.
